attributes.action: I would like mandatory weekly lessons to be integrated into our schools
attributes.additional_details: To support me on my mission to create a safer, more informative and happy future for our children.
attributes.background: We could potentially lower the risk drastically of children forming harmful habits & behaviours and actually set them up for a happy and healthy future once they leave education.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
